paper.title: A two level superimposed coding scheme for partial match retrieval

author.org: Department of Computing, Royal Melbourne Institute of Technology, Melbourne, Victoria, Australia, 3000
Department of Computer Science, University of Melbourne, Parkville, Victoria, Australia

paper.abstract: Abstract In this paper we describe a method for partial-match retrieval on very large data files. The method is based on superimposed coding techniques. Associated with the data file is a descriptor file containing bit strings which describe the records. In order to retrieve records efficiently a two level descriptor file is proposed. An analysis of this scheme is presented.
